description:
In a post-apocalyptic future that has been torn apart by shadowy creatures known as the Earless, humanity's heroes are the Players, who pilot mecha known as Equipment to battle their inhuman enemies while earning fame and fortune to boot. Echo is a young tech-head who dreams of working amongst the Players and their Equipment, going so far as to build a makeshift mecha of his own, but he has long since resigned himself to life in the destitute scrap-heaps that cover so much of the world, now. That is, until he discovers an amnesiac named μ (or “Mu”) who has a mechanical port in her back that is the telltale sign of a Player. The pair become fast friends, and they vow to use their skills to fight for the world and defeat The Earless.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ando_beanjam)

Pioneered the cel shaded, expressive look that distinguishes [Studio 4°C](https://anilist.co/studio/13/)'s CG work.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Xtalkama)

_Note: Not to be confused with the illustrator [Kamata](https://anilist.co/staff/221547/Kamata) or the mangaka [Kamata](https://anilist.co/staff/195065/Kamata)_

[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)

 Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki-P is a sound producer, composer, and arranger from Japan He was influenced by his keyboardist uncle and started learning keyboard at the age of 6. He has also been influenced by bands such as THE BACK HORN and composers such as Satoru Kosaki.  He is a relatively new producer, having only been active since early 2011, but is quickly becoming well known. On September 30, 2011, Jin submitted the song “Kagerou Days” (カゲロウデイズ) to Nico Nico Douga. The song quickly gained popularity and has since been viewed more than 3,000,000 times.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_pori__)** | **[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/taichi.hashimoto.18)**

__Taichi Hashimoto__ is a Japanese producer and series composer working for company [Slow Curve](http://www.slowcurve.co.jp/)

[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)

 Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki-P is a sound producer, composer, and arranger from Japan He was influenced by his keyboardist uncle and started learning keyboard at the age of 6. He has also been influenced by bands such as THE BACK HORN and composers such as Satoru Kosaki.  He is a relatively new producer, having only been active since early 2011, but is quickly becoming well known. On September 30, 2011, Jin submitted the song “Kagerou Days” (カゲロウデイズ) to Nico Nico Douga. The song quickly gained popularity and has since been viewed more than 3,000,000 times.

__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Website](https://taka8rie.com/) | [Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=236) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/taka8rie/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/taka8rie) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/riery_syame/) | [YouTube](https://m.youtube.com/channel/UC9xUIUtv3pyt_s_LtCLWP_Q) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rie_Takahashi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E6%A9%8B%E6%9D%8E%E4%BE%9D)

A voice actress and singer. She won a Best Female Newcomer Award at the 10th Seiyuu Awards in 2016.

She is part of the idol group [Earphones](https://anilist.co/staff/195973/) with fellow voice actresses [Marika Kouno](https://anilist.co/staff/119383) and [Yuki Nagaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119370), originally formed for the anime [Sore ga Seiyuu!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009).

**Non anime roles:**
- [Hu Tao](https://anilist.co/character/233425/) - Genshin Impact (Video Game)
- [Hikari](https://anilist.co/character/3966/Hikari) - Pokémon Masters EX (Video Game)
- Benten - Soul Tide (Video Game)
- Huma - Tower of Fantasy (Video Game)
- Diesel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (Video Game)
- Erina - Persona 5 Tactica (Video Game)
- Ren - Date a Live: Ren Dystopia (Video Game)
- Kokona - Strinova (Video Game)
- Perfumer - Arknights (Video Game)
